title: Way2quran: Recitations of the Holy Quran from around the Islamic world
notFoundData: There are currently no data to display on this page.
whatYouWantToRead: What do you want to read?

AboutScreen.about_1: A Quranic app that provides the service of listening to the recitations of various Qaris and downloading their audio clips.
AboutScreen.about_2: The app aims to facilitate users' access to Quranic recitations easily and conveniently.
AboutScreen.about_3: The app features a simple and user-friendly interface that allows users to search for their favorite reciters and listen to their recitations.
AboutScreen.about_4: The app allows users to download audio clips for reciters to listen to later without the need for an internet connection.
AboutScreen.about_5: The app is considered a valuable resource for those interested in the Quran.
